title: Scientific document processing: challenges for modern learning methods

tldr.text: A survey of modern neural network learning methods that tackle challenges of discourse structure and their interconnectivity in scientific publications, and efforts to collect large-scale datasets and tools developed to enable effective deep learning deployment for SDP.
